entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:22 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 02:54 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then rain beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late in the evening then light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
